name: Assembly Destruction
description:
An infiltrator is found in a robotics storage compound, that infiltrator is you. Your job is to wreck as much havoc as you can before being inevitably invalidated. Your drone is equipped with a special tractor beam and instant-weld system allowing you to easily repurpose loose parts to improve your destructive power. Good luck :)

CONTROLS: WASD to move, Left mouse button to fire cannons, Right mouse button to pick up or drop parts, ESC to pause the game.

Music and audio by https://nanodano.itch.io/

Made for Godot Wild Jam #53, with the theme of "Assembly required" and the 4 color limit wildcard.

Note: Because im stupid the Mac OS version may not work properly, i dont have a mac so i cant test but hopefully i exported it correctly. Play the web version if it doesnt work.
